thread.title: Great location and accommodations
thread.title_full: Great location and accommodations - Review of Novotel New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: pmcgill2970
title: Great location and accommodations
text: Novotel is located at 52nd and Broadway, making it an excellent location to get to Times Square, Central Park, and virtually anything you want to see or do in Manhatten. Accommodations are clean and recently updated, and the staff is always helpful and courteous.
